images.caption: Figure 2:Vibe Coding Overview. A triadic collaboration among developer, coding agent, and project, where iterative instructionâ€“feedback loops enable context-aware coding and result-oriented review.

header: 3Vibe Coding: The Engineering of Managing Coding Agents

images.caption: Figure 3:Vibe Coding Evolution Timeline: A comprehensive visualization of the development trajectory of Vibe Coding implementations from 2022 to 2025, showing the evolution from foundational Coding LLMs to sophisticated coding agent systems, execute environments and Feedback mechanism.

Figure 4:Large Language Model for Coding: Overview of the training lifecycle encompassing Data Foundation, Pre-training, and Post-training stages, with core capabilities including Code Generation, Code Understanding, Bug Detection, and Code Optimization.

Figure 5:Coding Agent Architecture: Overview of core components comprising Cognitive System, Memory Mechanism, and Tool Integration, with fundamental capabilities including Planning, Action execution, and multi-agent Collaboration for coordinated software development tasks.
Figure 6:Development Environment Architecture for Coding Agents: Isolated Environment, Interactive Environment, and Distributed Platform.

Figure 7:Feedback Loops Framework for Coding Agents: Internal feedback via Self-Refinement, and External feedback from Environment via Compiler Feedback and Execution Feedback, and from Human Feedback.
Figure 8:Comparison of Vibe Coding Development Models Framework With Software Development Models[551,552,553].
